cast.name: 伊莲娜·诺古哈 Helena Noguerra

introduction: Are you looking for a film like no other? Do you enjoy adventures into the poetic-trashy depths of the intimate, in the style of a creative, liberated, mischievous child with a twisted and hilarious psyche? Peau de cochon by Philippe Katerine is for you! Beware, once you've watched it, nothing will ever be the same. Before the Olympics' opening ceremony, Jimmy Fallon's mustache, his mignonisme, and his memorable visit to the FNC last year, Katerine fearlessly and unapologetically created an improbable unidentified cinematic object. Flammable, volatile, funny, and touching, this film has finally been restored and is accessible. It is also celebrating its twentieth anniversary this year. Prepare to be completely disconcerted.
